meanings.sent1: The teacher precertifies the students' completion of the assignment before the due date.
meanings.sent2: The company precertifies all products before they are released to ensure quality.
meanings.sent3: The robot precertifies the upcoming dance moves to avoid any embarrassing mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The eagle precertifies its flight path before soaring through the sky.
meanings.sent5: The doctor precertifies the surgery to guarantee its success.

meanings.sent1: The manager precertifies all expenses before they are reimbursed.
meanings.sent2: The committee precertifies all new policies to maintain consistency.
meanings.sent3: The cat precertifies the new scratching post to ensure it meets her standards.
meanings.sent4: The leader precertifies the battle strategy before engaging in combat.
meanings.sent5: The chef precertifies the menu for the event to avoid any last-minute changes.
